keyResponsibilities: Proficiency in Java, demonstrating a solid understanding of its ecosystem.
Utilization of knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) patterns and concepts.
Following the concepts of MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern.
Use of version tools like GIT for merging, branching, etc.
Utilizing knowledge of SQL in writing simple/medium queries.
Stay current with emerging technologies and trends in Java development.
Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve software defects and issues.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and practices.
mustHave: Must have experience of Java, Spring Framework, Hibernate and other relevant technologies.
Worked on front-end technologies such as JSP, servlet, HTML, JavaScript, CSS and jQuery
Work experience on RESTful web services, and aware about API design.
Familiarity with database systems such as MySQL, MongoDB databases.
Proficiency in version control systems (e.g., Git).
goodToHave: Aware/Hands on experience on Jasper Reports
Experience with microservice architecture is advantageous.
Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies is a plus.

desiredExperience: The ideal candidates should be well trained or certified in Spring, Java, and Hibernate.
Should have knowledge of Spring boot/ Spring MVC & Hibernate.
Should be aware about front-end technology.
Should be aware about java full stack development.
The ideal candidates should be well trained or certified in Python.
Should have knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI).
Should be able to integrate backend with frontend.

salesTargetAchievement: Meet and exceed sales targets for the assigned product portfolio.
Develop and implement effective sales strategies to drive revenue growth.
Lead sales team and manage daily sales activities for team.
productKnowledge: Possess in-depth knowledge of the company's products and services.
Conduct product presentations and demonstrations to potential clients.
clientRelationshipManagement: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients.
Understand client needs and tailor product offerings to meet their requirements.
marketResearch: Stay updated on industry trends and competitor products.
Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and customer preferences.
salesPipelineManagement: Manage the entire sales process from lead generation to closing deals.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of sales activities and customer interactions
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
Proven track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets in the product sales domain.
Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.

details.description: As a Sr Java Developer (PSE), you will play a pivotal role in our dynamic and innovative software development team. This position requires a high level of proficiency in Java, along with a deep understanding of its ecosystem. As a key contributor, you will be involved in designing, implementing, and maintaining Java-based applications that are not only robust and scalable but also adhere to industry best practices.
keyResponsibilities: Proficiency in Java, demonstrating a solid understanding of its ecosystem.
Utilization of knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) patterns and concepts.
Creating technical designs for small functional modules with various design and architectural patterns.
Make sure implementation is following the concepts of MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern
Managing version tools like GIT for merging, branching, etc.
Conducting Code review for peers to maintain best code quality.
Utilizing knowledge of SQL in writing complex/medium queries.
Stay current with emerging technologies and trends in Java development.
Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve software defects and issues.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and practices.
strongTechnicalSkills: Experience with REST Web Services, Open SPML.
Basic knowledge of SQL is a must.
Proficiency in web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and jQuery.
Familiarity with markup languages such as XML and JSON.
Solid understanding of multithreading and synchronization concepts.
additionalSkills: Experienced in SaaS based product development.
Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Familiarity with front-end frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular).
Participation in open-source projects or contributions.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
